Description: Ostracon, large section of the upper-body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of the end of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395002) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395002)
